author: amna_99593
content:
Hi Everyone,

I am new to this group and don't have a specific tag for my question that's why I am placing my query here in uncategorized

I have started working on a research project related to interoperability between ethereum and Binance Smart Chain regarding charging payments.

I need guidance that how should I start working on it. what path should I choose? I have learnt about ethereum and binance smart chain and how smart contracts and consensus algorithms works on them but have not done naything practically. Do I need to do practical evaluation before starting my own development?

Need guidance if someone already well aware of working on ethereum and binance smart chain.

Thanks
